prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Synth Lead, Guitar, Synth Pad, Piano, Drums, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Piano, Guitar, Synth Lead, Synth Pad, and Drums, but no Bass.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Synth Lead, Guitar, Synth Pad, Piano, and Drums, omitting Bass.

Style 3:
No Bass is included in this song, but it does have Piano, Guitar, Synth Lead, Synth Pad, and Drums.
